title: 澳洲記者發現疑似中方間諜人員
contents:
相關視頻：
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzRUzNLVaGg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7DyKAOKObvY


澳洲記者Avi Yemini在墨爾本街頭采訪時發現疑似中方間諜人員

"A couple of days ago, I exposed a Chinese spy working the streets of Melbourne. Since then, the story has gained a lot of local and international attention."

相關報道
https://www.3aw.com.au/video-of-alleged-chinese-spy-intimidating-students-at-a-melbourne-protest-sparks-foreign-interference-fears/

如果大家有關於此人的任何信息請舉報，將此人驅除出境！
